body_html: thread locals have been causing trouble for me over at #8792 because once python-less libtorch.so is split out from python-full _C.so, Windows doesn't support exposing thread_local variables across the shared-object boundary. Will this PR introduce another occurrence of this issue?
body_text: thread locals have been causing trouble for me over at #8792 because once python-less libtorch.so is split out from python-full _C.so, Windows doesn't support exposing thread_local variables across the shared-object boundary. Will this PR introduce another occurrence of this issue?
body: thread locals have been causing trouble for me over at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8792 because once python-less libtorch.so is split out from python-full _C.so, Windows doesn't support exposing thread_local variables across the shared-object boundary. Will this PR introduce another occurrence of this issue?
